attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: inform the six uk big banks and the six uk credit card companys that all must reduce interst rates to a maximum of 8% apr max for all new purchases from first of december 2008 for three years.contact british gas and electic company inform all electic and gas supplying companies for a 1930 semi detached house with 3 bedrooms with central heating ie with 7 raditors and the heating is on from 7.15 am till 8.15 am then on again at 5 pm till 10 pm ie 6 hours perday set at 20 centigrade the maximun heating bill for a year is 450 pounds that they can charge per year for gas and 300 pounds for electicity total inc vat to be charged 750 pounds yearly, relax the road tax changes that are coming in  april 2009 for 1 year lower stamp duty by 20% across all bands  ,reduce tax on pension companys by 15%  reduce vat to 15% all items over 50,000 pounds reduce vat to 12.5%

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
